content.rendered:
The Algarve Tub Chair is perfectly suited for commercial use, ideal for reception / waiting areas, offices, as well as hospitality and retail environments.

It is leather faced and matched perfectly with a faux leather around the back of the tub chair. This lowers the cost to you but still provides you with a great chair.
